text: Latirus gibbulus, common name the gibbose latirus, is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Description== The size of the shell varies between 50 mm and 115 mm. ==Distribution== This marine species occurs in the Indo-West Pacific. ==References== ==External links== * Lyons W.G. & Snyder M.A. (2013) The genus Pustulatirus Vermeij and Snyder, 2006 (Gastropoda: Fasciolariidae: Peristerniinae) in the western Atlantic, with descriptions of three new species. Zootaxa 3636(1): 035–058 * Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1791
title: Latirus gibbulus
